评论详情: This was exactly the fun pants my daughter was looking for.
Seamless shredded on leg first wear

评论概述: Not the look I was going for
评论详情: The picture is accurate to what you're ordering, but the material is very thin and silky. They do tend to run long, so for the short ladies (5'3") Its hard to fold the bottom up and stay folded. Overall the look of the pants looks very cheap and I wouldn't represent them at a "Free People Dupe". At least for the pink colored pants. I ordered a Medium.
So disappointed,quality not so good
Waistband rolls and makes it uncomfortable. Returned.

I had high hopes for these striped pants, but they really missed the mark. The material feels stiff and uncomfortable almost plastic like, not what I was expecting at all. The fit is also really off—too tight in some areas and strangely loose in others, making them awkward to wear. I loved the look of the stripes, but unfortunately, the fit and feel just don’t work for me. Disappointed with this purchase
I love these pants! They are so fun and funky. Super comfortable. Very thin material (not see through though) so it would be more for fall and spring.

Been seeing a few influencers wearing these free people pants, price is something I was not willing to pay, I did my research to find these, let me just say they look just like them!!  Quality is awesome price is perfect, have gotten so many compliments!!
So cute and such great quality. They aren’t see through and they’re super trendy with the boxer brief style going on right now.

Been wearing these pants weekly! They are very comfortable and can be worn casually in a lot of different ways. A lot of different tops match them so you can play around with it. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments too. Washed them a couple times now since getting them and I let them air dry. I feel like the color has lasted. Material isn’t the best but for me, it’s been a great purchase!

I was worried ordering these pants but they exceeded my expectations! The fabric is not super soft but I love whatever material this is made out of! They are not only cute and vibrant but the fabric is very breathable so great for summer and fall! I am 5’4” and wear a 6-8 and I ordered a small. I could have done a medium as well for a little more oversized! Already purchased in another color!

Loved spending a travel day in these cute pants. They didn’t wrinkle as much as I thought they might. They kept me cool in the high 80s and I got lots of compliments. The graphic tee is from Amazon as well.

These are not the linen blend like the FP pair but still a breathable light fabric. I went my peoples reviews and ordered medium, I’m a size 8/10 and for more room I returned the medium for a large. Still a bit snug in the hips but overall great.
Love these so much! Get tons of compliments.
I love these! Great dupe for Free People. I’m purchasing every color. I usually wear a 28/29 jeans and I order the large and they fit perfectly. I’m 5’6” #earnscommission
Very cute but so long! I'm 5'4 and would have needed several inches hemmed to wear with flats. If you're on the taller side, go for it because they're a great FP dupe.
What is going on with these front pockets!? They are so unflattering and stick way far out. Not cute

I’m 5’9” and 180 lbs, and the large fit perfectly and were a good, cropped length on me. I like these and think they’re cute. The quality is good for the price. They’re more a “silky” material than I expected, but not bad. I like that the drawstring is functional and the color is true to the photo. The front pockets are kind of awkwardly located, but it’s not a deal break for me. These will be great for summer and my beach vacation coming up!
Chegou em uma semana no Brasil e de qualidade/ embalagem perfeita. 🇧🇷

The material is lightweight and thin which is perfect for summer/travelling and the design is exactly like the Free People pants for a quarter of the price. I’m 170cm and the length with shoes on is just right without them dragging on the ground.
